title: Akha (1991) Bible
title_vernacular: Akha (1991) ຄຳພີຂອງພຣະເຈົ້າ
description: This complete translation of the Bible is in the Akha language which is spoken in Southern China. It was completed in 1991 by the Thailand Bible Society.

language.name: Akha
language.area: Shan state, east Kengtung District. Also in China, Laos, Thailand, Viet Nam.
